PKTOOLS

For more information, please consult home page: http://pktools.nongnu.org

All utilities in pktools use command line options and have a built in help

use the -h option to get help
pktools ALWAYS use -i for input and -o for output (unlike GDAL utilities that commonly use last argument as output and second but last argument as input)

Install

To install, please check http://pktools.nongnu.org/html/index.html#pktools_installation

Course

Set the environment variables and copy the data
  • Raster and vector data processing using GDAL/OGR : part 1
  • Introduction to pktools : part 2
  • Machine learning: image classification : part 3
  • Point data from LiDAR acquisitions: creating digital elevation models : part 4
  • Introduction to gnuplot : part 5

Exercises

  • Vector overlays and extraction : exercises 1-5
  • Masking and filtering : exercise 6
  • Openstreetmap, SQLite and sql commands : exercise 7
  • Image classification : exercise 8
  • Multicore processing with pktools : exercise 9
  • Image composits using pkmosaic : exercise 10
  • IEEE data fusion contest 2013 : exercise 11
